name: TOJam_11
description:
My goal at this years game jam was to work on a prototype, with proper code! So didn't get very far, but the base of code is very clean and usable in the future...

I will be continuing to develop aspects of this game in the coming months, and hope to keep this project up to date.

This game is built for Xbox controllers...

Left stick = move

A button = dash (which is also attack, player will turn white when attack is ready again)

B button = ability1 (which is currently 'chain explosion') Costs 5 AP to use

AP is generated over time, or by killing enemies with the 'dash' attack (player is red during dash attack)
